masthan wani santhuwarayanda asham abdul namathi deshatakayada mehi hinda bhawana kala bawa me prakashanaye sandahan we.”1 “1920 di pamana mema puda bima aakramanaya kala masthan namathi musalmanuwa ehi idikala thawakalika godanagilida kada iwathkara in pitawiya yuthubawata adhikaranayen ana kara athi bawa kalthota aarachchi mahathage dina pothaka satahan wi atha.inpasuwa ’70 agabhagayedi pradeshaye deshapalana balaya labagath ekthara muslim manthriwarayeku kuragala muslimwarunge puda bimak bawata pathkirime katayuthu wegawath kala athara ohugen salakili sathkara menma “chakrawarthi” pattam labagath atham unnansela mema winashaya nihadawama anudana wadalaha.” “muslimwaru dahanawa wana siyawase aga bhagaye thanjamata gos kansa wele¹ma ha dadamas weledama jayatama karagena yamin sitiyaha.
